titles: By the Lord Protector. A proclamation commanding all papists, and all other persons who have been of the late Kings party or his sons, to depart out of the cities of London and Westminster, and late lines of communication, within three days.
author: England and Wales. Lord Protector (1658-1660 : R. Cromwell)
Cromwell, Richard, 1626-1712.
publisher: Printed by Henry Hills and John Field, Printers to His Highness, and are to be sold at the seven Stars in Fleetstreet over against Dunstans Church,
notes: Dated at end: Given at White-Hall the three and twentieth day of April in the year of our Lord, 1659.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Royalists --  England --  London --  Early works to 1800.
Catholics --  England --  London --  Legal status, laws, etc. --  Early works to 1800.
